categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Viyenah was a male officer of the Galactic Empire. Some years after the Battle of Khuiumin, he sent a report to Emperor Palpatine about Eyttyrmin Batiiv survivors.

A Colonel in Imperial Intelligence, Viyenah was tasked by the Emperor himself to investigate the pirate lair Providence, some time after 5 BBY. After months of investigation, he provided a complete report, labeled N°87331.84 B, to Palpatine.

Viyenah was very proud of his status and was convinced that the Empire was the guarantor of civilization. He had very little tolerance for smugglers and pirates, but was prompt to praise the captain Almar Varangi Ferd's capacities, since he seemed to have been part of the Imperial Navy, which Viyenah considered a glorious institution.
Viyenah was created by Jean-Michel Ringuet for the ambiguously canon roleplaying Gamemaster help Providence which appeared in the French magazine Avalon 1. He was the narrator.
